page.title: 09TREDINGTON SCHOOL CONTINUED
page.content: { Janes family}have two houses, one in the Cotswolds and one in Malvern. At the school they start at{9.45.} There are two playtimes, one at{10.40-10.55 and the other at{2.00-2.15. }The dinner times are, Infants{12.00}until {1.00 and Juniors 12.15 until 1.00. The lessons finish at{3.00. }Jane started school at the age of 4. She remembers her mum giving up smoking and herself falling in the sandpit. She will be eleven when she leaves Treddington School. She will then go on to Cleeve School. Jane does a Spelling Test once a week and an Arithmetic and Table Test every day. Her favourite{lessons}are Art and Swimming. Her least favourite lesson is English. Janes school presents plays.This year it was Hansel and Gretel. They also went to Cowley Manor for four days.
